heading: Serpentâ€™s Lair Dungeon Guide
content: Serpent's Lair has a fairly straightforward layout, and hosts the dangerous Nagari (Snakes) that have multiple ways to you. It is decent to farm despite having ultra-tanky Animus Carriers, but is not currently a possible . There is no boss. Once you Destroy the 3 Wards of Eyes, the dungeon is complete. This dungeon unlocks the , a decent offensive aspect for a Fire Sorcerer. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
